We, as makeup wearers know, plump, hydrated skin can make foundation glide on much more smoothly and can help skin look healthy. Hyaluronic acid is a bit of a buzz term these (you've probably seen loads of influencers talk about it) and for a good reason - it's hydrating.
This particular serum from L'Oréal Paris contains 1.5 per cent pure hyaluronic acid made up of three different types that together work to re-plump skin in just one hour, according to the brand.

First, macro-hyaluronic acid works to hydrate and smooth, micro-hyaluronic acid to plump. Then there's the small but oh-so-mighty micro-epidemic, which penetrates deeper through the skin's surface. After Covid, we're all naturally a bit weary of anything that sounds like 'epidemic', but this micro-epidermic is a very effective type of hyaluronic acid. A huge 50 times smaller than standard hyaluronic acid, it can penetrate deeper through the skin's surface and plump out wrinkles from within. What's more, you can feel rest assured that the chaps who know what's what when it comes to skincare have approved of it. That's because it's been 'validated in partnership with an advisory panel of dermatologists'. The L'Oréal Paris Hyaluronic Acid Serum Revitalift Filler has racked up over 5,000 five-star reviews on Amazon. Some have noted the amazing difference it has made in reducing wrinkles, while others commented on how effective it is compared to more expensive serums.

'Amazing,' wrote one happy customer. 'Love this product! In only a few days it reduced the appearance of fine lines around my eyes, forehead and cheeks. I’ve now been using it for around six weeks and cannot believe the results!'

'The best,' a second agreed. 'I tried many hyaluronic acids and to be honest, this one is the best, even compared to super expensive ones.'A third penned: 'I bought this after seeing an ad on TV, and to be honest wasn't expecting huge results but I'm so glad I did! Seen a difference within a few days and now, after nearly 4 weeks, my skin looks pretty darn good.' So, if you'd to take a leaf out of a top makeup artist's book and get a dewy base for makeup, then shop the L'Oreal Paris Hyaluronic Acid Serum Revitalift Filler for £16.60 on Amazon.
